body_html:
For everyone interested in official eGPU support in macOS, I recommend creating a ticket in Apple's bug reporter: https://bugreport.apple.com/logon
And mentioning my ticket via "Also see rdar://29836015"

body:
For everyone interested in official eGPU support in macOS, I recommend creating a ticket in Apple's bug reporter: https://bugreport.apple.com/logon
And mentioning my ticket via "Also see rdar://29836015"
